Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The best power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) of 6.33% was obtained from PBDTT-DPP75-TPD25 with [6,6]-phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) due to the improved light absorption and thus a short - circuit current density ( J SC ) higher than 16 mA / cm^2.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBDTT-DPP75-TPD25 |
| [6,6]-phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) |

The two material names identified in the paragraph are "PBDTT-DPP75-TPD25" and "[6,6]-phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM )". These materials are mentioned as components in the power conversion efficiency experiment that resulted in a PCE of 6.33%.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBDTT-DPP75-TPD25 |
| PC71BM |

Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The best power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) of 6.33% was obtained from PBDTT-DPP75-TPD25 with [6,6]-phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) due to the improved light absorption and thus a short - circuit current density ( J SC ) higher than 16 mA / cm^2.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| best power conversion efficiency (PCE) |
| light absorption |
| short-circuit current density (J SC) |

The paragraph mentions three properties: "best power conversion efficiency (PCE)", "light absorption", and "short-circuit current density (J SC)". These are the entities that should be included in the table.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| best power conversion efficiency (PCE) |
| short-circuit current density (J SC) |

After reviewing the paragraph, I have identified two properties that clearly refer to material properties: "best power conversion efficiency (PCE)" and "short-circuit current density (J SC)". These are the entities that should be included in the table. The other property mentioned, "light absorption", is a physical process rather than a material property, so it has been excluded.
